div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DetectedIssue|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `DetectedIssue` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `DetectedIssue`. Element `DetectedIssue` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue`.
Element `DetectedIssue.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.meta`.
Element `DetectedIssue.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.implicitRules`.
Element `DetectedIssue.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.language`.
Element `DetectedIssue.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.text`.
Element `DetectedIssue.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.contained`.
Element `DetectedIssue.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.identifier`.

Note that the target element context `DetectedIssue.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `DetectedIssue.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.status`.
Element `DetectedIssue.category` is will have a context of DetectedIssue based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DetectedIssue`.
Element `DetectedIssue.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.code`.
Element `DetectedIssue.severity` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.severity`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.subject`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DetectedIssue.subject` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `DetectedIssue.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.patient`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DetectedIssue.encounter` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `DetectedIssue.encounter` is will have a context of DetectedIssue based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DetectedIssue`.

Note that the target element context `DetectedIssue.identified[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DetectedIssue`. Element `DetectedIssue.identified[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.identified[x]`. Note that the target element context `DetectedIssue.identified[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `DetectedIssue`.

Element matches Basic element path `Basic.author`, use that element instead. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `DetectedIssue.author` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `DetectedIssue.author` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.author`.
Element `DetectedIssue.implicated` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.implicated`.
Element `DetectedIssue.evidence` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.evidence`.
Element `DetectedIssue.evidence.code` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.evidence.code`.
Element `DetectedIssue.evidence.detail` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.evidence.detail`.
Element `DetectedIssue.detail` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.detail`.
Element `DetectedIssue.reference` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.reference`.
Element `DetectedIssue.mitigation` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.mitigation`.
Element `DetectedIssue.mitigation.action` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.mitigation.action`.
Element `DetectedIssue.mitigation.date` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.mitigation.date`.
Element `DetectedIssue.mitigation.author` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `DetectedIssue.mitigation.author`.
Element `DetectedIssue.mitigation.note` is will have a context of DetectedIssue.mitigation based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `DetectedIssue`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
